metadata.title: CVE-2017-12979 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: DokuWiki through 2017-02-19c has stored XSS when rendering a maliciouslanguage name in a code element, in /inc/parser/xhtml.php. An attacker cancreate or edit a wiki with this element to trigger JavaScript execution.

criterions.comment: dokuwiki: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
